infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow OnMyList to access your contacts to import them into the app.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescriptionLocation: This allows you to import your existing contacts into the app.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs microphone access for call features.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow OnMyList to use your camera for profile pictures and video calls.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow OnMyList to access your photos for profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow OnMyList to save photos to your library.

plugins.contactsPermission: Allow OnMyList to access your contacts.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow OnMyList to access your photos for profile pictures.
